title: Script and Serif font?
content:
Hi could anyone help me identify the two fonts in this please? horrible piece of design i know but need to replicate them for a client.

Many Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lady_5746.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content:
After closer inspection it appears the ’lady’ font might be hand rendered or just shockingly made. If this is the case could anyone suggest alternate faces.

Cheers
The italic serif seems to be Palatino.

Thanks as always Jan

anyone any suggestions for the main ’logo’ font?

cheers
